statements: SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT ticket_price, quantity_sold FROM ticket_sales WHERE film_screening_id = '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765'
SELECT ticket_id, film_screening_id, ticket_price, quantity_sold FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY ticket_price ASC
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC
SELECT ticket_id, film_screening_id FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price < 20.00
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC
SELECT ticket_id, film_screening_id, quantity_sold FROM ticket_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE film_screening_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND ticket_price < 30
SELECT film_screening_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY film_screening_id HAVING total_sold > 10 ORDER BY total_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM film_screening ORDER BY screening_date DESC;
SELECT film_name, screening_date, available_seats FROM film_screening WHERE available_seats > 0;
SELECT screening_id, film_name, screening_date, available_seats FROM film_screening WHERE available_seats < 50;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY ticket_id;
SELECT ticket_price, customer_name FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 20 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT film_name, screening_date, available_seats FROM film_screening ORDER BY screening_date DESC, available_seats ASC
SELECT * FROM film_screening JOIN ticket_sales ON film_screening.screening_id = ticket_sales.screening_id WHERE ticket_sales.ticket_price > 20
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM ticket_sales WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_screenings FROM film_screening

SELECT film_name, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price, MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price FROM film_screening JOIN ticket_sales ON film_screening.screening_id = ticket_sales.screening_id GROUP BY film_name HAVING max_price > 25 ORDER BY min_price ASC
SELECT * FROM Film;
SELECT film_name, film_director FROM Film WHERE film_genre='Comedy';
SELECT * FROM Screening ORDER BY screening_date DESC;
SELECT film_id, COUNT(*) as number_of_sales FROM TicketSale GROUP BY film_id;
SELECT film_name, ticket_price FROM Film JOIN Screening ON Film.film_id = Screening.film_id WHERE ticket_price > 20.00;
SELECT * FROM Film WHERE film_genre = 'Action';
SELECT film_name, film_director FROM Film WHERE film_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Screening WHERE screening_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31';
SELECT film_name, screening_date, ticket_price FROM Film JOIN Screening ON Film.film_id = Screening.film_id WHERE film_genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT s.screening_id, ts.sale_id, ts.number_of_tickets FROM Screening s JOIN TicketSale ts ON s.screening_id = ts.screening_id;
SELECT * FROM film_screenings;
SELECT film_name, screening_date FROM film_screenings WHERE available_tickets > 0;
SELECT screening_date, film_name, available_tickets, sold_tickets FROM film_screenings WHERE screening_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sold_tickets DESC;
SELECT film_name, sold_tickets, (available_tickets + sold_tickets) AS total_tickets FROM film_screenings WHERE sold_tickets > 50;
SELECT id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT film_name, available_tickets, screening_date FROM film_screenings WHERE available_tickets > 0 ORDER BY screening_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT film_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM film_screenings JOIN ticket_sales ON film_screenings.id = ticket_sales.screening_id ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT film_name, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM film_screenings JOIN transactions ON film_screenings.id = transactions.screening_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT film_name, ticket_number, sale_amount, sale_date FROM film_screenings JOIN ticket_sales ON film_screenings.id = ticket_sales.screening_id ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT film_name, refund_amount, refund_date FROM film_screenings JOIN ticket_sales ON film_screenings.id = ticket_sales.screening_id JOIN refunds ON ticket_sales.id = refunds.ticket_sale_id ORDER BY refund_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT film_title, screening_date, ticket_price FROM Films;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_tickets_purchased FROM Customers ORDER BY total_tickets_purchased DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_quantity > 2;
SELECT film_title, screening_time, available_seats FROM Screenings WHERE available_seats < 50 ORDER BY screening_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_total FROM Customers JOIN Transactions ON Customers.customer_id = Transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Films;
SELECT film_title, screening_date FROM Films WHERE ticket_price > 10 ORDER BY screening_date DESC;
SELECT film_title, ticket_price, screening_date FROM Films WHERE screening_date >= '2022-01-01' AND screening_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Films.film_title, Screenings.screening_time FROM Customers INNER JOIN Tickets ON Customers.customer_id = Tickets.customer_id INNER JOIN Films ON Tickets.film_id = Films.film_id INNER JOIN Screenings ON Films.film_id = Screenings.film_id WHERE Customers.total_tickets_purchased > 5 ORDER BY Screenings.screening_time ASC;

SELECT film_title, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold, SUM(ticket_total_price) AS total_revenue FROM Films INNER JOIN Tickets ON Films.film_id = Tickets.film_id GROUP BY film_title HAVING total_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY total_tickets_sold DESC;
